alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN BRACKEN, NORTHEASTERN PENDLETON, SOUTHEASTERN CLERMONT AND SOUTHWESTERN BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Neville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Augusta, Felicity, Brooksville, Higginsport, Moscow, Neville, Chilo, Mount Auburn, Woolcutt, Willow Grove, Bradford, Lenoxburg, Peach Grove, Ivor, Foster, Feesburg, Johnsville, Rock Springs and Utopia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
